text: kaheva lagya, ke jo ame tamari sathe mali, satya marganum anusarana karava lagi'e to, amane amara sahera manthi kadhi mukavamam avase, sum ame temane santa ane pavitra saheramam jagya nathi api? Jyam dareka prakarana phalo mali ave che, je amari pase roji mate che, parantu temana manthi ghana loko kami janata nathi
